data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Portland, Jamaica that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Portland, Jamaica
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 81,000 citizens of Portland, Jamaica, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.section_summary: On average, 7 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Portland, Jamaica.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Portland, Jamaica.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Portland. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Hope Bay
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Hope Bay, Portland, Jamaica.
Spirit, teach the church in the state of Portland to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Father, help the 24,097 believers in Portland to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 56,903 lost friends and neighbors.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Portland
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.
